traits.name: Great Weapon Fighting
traits.desc: When the champion rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack with a melee weapon, it can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.desc: The champion's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a result of 19 or 20.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Action Surge (1/Short Rest)
actions.desc: The champion makes two glaive attacks.
